sqls.sql: SELECT part_status, part_no, part_name, part_spec, part_unit, part_type_product, part_type01, part_type02, part_type03, part_type04, part_type05, part_type06, part_type07, part_type08, part_type09, part_type10, part_type11, part_type12, part_type13, part_type14, part_type15, part_type16, part_type17, part_type18, part_type19, part_type20, part_spec01, part_spec02, part_spec03, part_spec04, part_spec05, part_spec06, part_spec07, part_spec08, part_spec09, part_spec10, part_spec11, part_spec12, part_spec13, part_spec14, part_spec15, part_spec16, part_spec17, part_spec18, part_spec19, part_spec20, part_spec21, part_spec22, part_spec23, part_spec24, part_spec25, part_spec26, part_spec27, part_spec28, part_spec29, part_spec30, doc_keyword, part_color, part_length, part_width, part_height, part_weight_net, part_weight_gross, part_weight_leftover, safe_storage_qty_max, safe_storage_qty_warn, safe_storage_qty_min, sale_qty_min, sale_qty_add, lead_time_produce_start, lead_time_produce_end, wkc_no, part_uph, mo_ok_rate, mo_qty_min, mo_qty_max, mo_qty_add, mo_qty_lot, part_difficulty_rate, load_material_lead_time, load_material_span_time, load_material_speed, is_manipulator, is_special, lead_time_purchase, unit_price_standard, unit_price_average, unit_price_manual, cost_punish_delay0, cost_punish_delay1, mrp_region_no, inv_io_nocheck, rmh_no, crt_time, crt_user, crt_user_no, crt_user_name, crt_host, upd_time, upd_user, upd_user_no, upd_user_name, upd_host, valid_day FROM pd_part WHERE part_id = @part_id;
